title: The Zombie Story
description: Unfolding on the streets of Los Angeles is a new breed of monster... Orlando, fresh from the mid west, arrives at his new high school on his Harley Davidson. All he wants is to make it through the day, and begin his training as a Zombie Hunter. But someone has different plans for him. The Zombie Story is a Novella Books Available by M.M. Chronicles of The Zombie StoryBook Dead RelativesBook City of the Un-DeadBook The Un-Dead CircusBook The Rising Empire of the Un-DeadA New Orleans on MarsBayou BluesBourbon Street RunVisit M.M. author: M.M. Shelley
